Start with your most important tasks and work your way down.

patterns: How can I manage my stress?
responses: It’s okay to feel this way. Try some deep breathing exercises.
Take a short walk, meditate, or talk to someone. You don’t have to do this alone.
Focus on your breathing: Inhale for 4 seconds, hold, then exhale for 4 seconds.
It’s important to reach out when you’re struggling. You don’t have to go through it alone.

patterns: What should I eat to stay healthy?
How can I improve my diet?
responses: A balanced diet includes fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains.
Hydrate throughout the day and avoid processed foods as much as possible.
Try to eat a variety of foods to ensure you’re getting all necessary nutrients.
Small, consistent changes to your diet can make a big difference in the long run!

patterns: How do I exercise during work?

A 30-minute walk or light stretching can do wonders for your body and mind.

Regular activity, even just 10 minutes, can improve both your physical and mental health.
